verbs.description: [V: recovered] [ARG1: lost squadron plane] leads to new mystery go with howstuffworks on a search and rescue mission in the frozen back country of greenland as a crew finds a p-38 wwii plane from the lost squadron lt john a pritchard greenland cpl loren howarth jim salazar lost squadron duck benjamin bottoms nicholas a veronico mia repatriation foundation
